title: Change design theme to retro aesthetic
description: Update the app's visual design from minimal/clean to a retro aesthetic. This includes: retro color palette, pixel-style or retro fonts, vintage UI elements (borders, shadows), and nostalgic visual touches. Apply consistently across all pages: HomePage, IdeasPage, IdeaDetailPage, SavedPage, Header, and IdeaCard components.
close_reason: Implemented retro aesthetic theme with pixel fonts, vintage color palette, bold borders, and retro shadows across all pages

title: Add public sharing feature for ideas
description:
Allow users to share an idea publicly via a shareable link. This could include:
- Generate a unique shareable URL for any idea
- Copy-to-clipboard button for the share link
- Social media share buttons (Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.)
- Optional: OG meta tags for rich link previews when shared
close_reason: Added ShareButton component with copy-to-clipboard, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn sharing. Added OG meta tags.

title: Deploy to Netlify
description: Deploy the Vibe Coder app to Netlify for public access

title: Build IdeaDetailPage with full specs
description: Create detailed idea view showing: title, full description, time estimate, difficulty, suggested tech stack, features to build (bullet list), and learning goals. Include Save button and Back to list navigation.
close_reason: Built IdeaDetailPage with full specs, features, and learning goals

title: Implement localStorage favorites system
description: Create hooks/utilities for saving and loading favorite idea IDs to localStorage. Key: 'vibe-coder-saved-ideas'. Provide useSavedIdeas hook with save, unsave, and isSaved functionality.
close_reason: Implemented useSavedIdeas hook with localStorage persistence

title: Add filtering and search for ideas
description: Allow filtering ideas by tech stack, time estimate, or keywords. Add a search bar to find specific ideas quickly.
close_reason: Implemented search bar, tech stack filter, and time estimate filter on IdeasPage

title: Create predefined idea templates data
description: Create TypeScript data file with 5-10 project ideas per skill level (beginner, intermediate, advanced). Each idea should include: title, shortDescription, fullDescription, timeEstimate, difficulty, stack, features, and learningGoals.
close_reason: Created 15 predefined ideas (5 per skill level) with full specs

title: Add wireframes to each project idea
description: Expand each of the 15 project ideas to include ASCII wireframes. Update the Idea type to include wireframes field, add wireframes data for all ideas, and update IdeaDetailPage to display the wireframes.
close_reason: Added wireframes to all 15 ideas with ASCII art displays in terminal-style blocks

title: Add community-submitted ideas
description: Allow users to submit their own project ideas via a form. Could use a simple backend or GitHub issues as storage.

title: Build HomePage component with skill level selector
description: Create the landing page with app title, tagline, skill level radio selector (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced), and Generate Ideas button. Button disabled until skill selected.
close_reason: Built HomePage with skill level radio selector and Generate button

title: Build IdeasPage with idea cards list
description: Create ideas list page showing filtered ideas based on selected skill level. Each card shows title, short description, time estimate, difficulty badge, stack tags, and save/favorite heart button. Include Regenerate button to shuffle ideas.
close_reason: Built IdeasPage with IdeaCard components and regenerate functionality

title: Build SavedPage for viewing favorites
description: Create saved ideas page displaying all favorited ideas. Show count in header. Reuse IdeaCard component. Allow unsaving from this view. Show empty state when no saved ideas.
close_reason: Built SavedPage with empty state and saved count display

title: Scaffold Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind project
description: Initialize the project with Vite, React 18, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Include basic folder structure and configuration.
close_reason: Scaffolded Vite + React + TS + Tailwind project with full structure

title: Add routing with React Router
description: Set up React Router with routes: / (HomePage), /ideas (IdeasPage), /ideas/:id (IdeaDetailPage), /saved (SavedPage). Include Header component with navigation and saved count badge.
close_reason: Added React Router with all 4 routes and Header component

title: Add progress tracking for started projects
description: Let users mark an idea as 'Started' and track their progress with checkboxes for features and learning goals. Store progress in localStorage.

title: Add dark mode toggle
description: Add a retro-styled dark mode with CRT monitor aesthetic - green/amber text on dark background, scanlines effect optional.

title: Add AI-powered idea generator
description: Instead of only predefined ideas, integrate an AI API to generate custom project ideas based on user preferences like interests, available time, and tech stack preferences.
